name: Oscillo
description: Oscillo is a retro-themed oscilloscope robot, proudly belonging to the WebtrES club. With a classic button design and arms and legs always in a hand-down position, Oscillo brings a nostalgic charm to any room. Its screen displays a fun and addictive game of snake, providing endless entertainment. Oscillo is not just a stylish addition to your collection, but also a versatile companion with its impressive abilities.
